articles.title: Mukesh Ambani's Reliance Explores Tapeworm Drug for COVID-19 - NDTV
articles.description: Reliance Industries Ltd. is working on a new COVID-19 drug and cheaper testing kits as the conglomerate owned by Asia's richest man Mukesh Ambani looks to curb the pathogen which has ravaged India in the past year.
articles.content:
India's most-valuable company is exploring use of a tapeworm drug, Niclosamide, as a cure for Covid
Reliance Industries Ltd. is working on a new COVID-19 drug and cheaper testing kits as the conglom… [+1497 chars]

articles.title: No Chickenjoy: Jollibee closes Philippines outlet after woman finds fried towel in meal - AsiaOne
articles.description: Many Filipinos enjoy Jollibee's fried chicken but one woman found no joy in her meal. On Wednesday (June 2), Alique Perez took to Facebook to express her disgust when the Chickenjoy meal she had ordered via a food delivery app turned out to be something else.…

articles.title: Experts: Chinese vaccines are critical to Asean in Covid fight - The Star Online
